name: delft-digital-archive-content
description: TU Delft - Digital Archive content site
author: Adam Meszaros <adam.meszaros@digirati.com>

scripts.local:install: rm -rf ./delft-static-site-generator && git clone git@github.com:digirati-co-uk/delft-static-site-generator.git && npm run link
scripts.link: cd delft-static-site-generator && yarn && rm -rf ./.git && rm -rf ./content/ && rm -rf ./src/collections && rm -rf ./src/exhibitions && rm -rf ./src/objects && cd .. && ln -s $PWD/content $PWD/delft-static-site-generator/content && ln -s $PWD/collections $PWD/delft-static-site-generator/src/collections && ln -s $PWD/exhibitions $PWD/delft-static-site-generator/src/exhibitions && ln -s $PWD/objects $PWD/delft-static-site-generator/src/objects
scripts.release: npm run link && cd delft-static-site-generator && gatsby build
